name: Time Shift Tower Defence
description:
Use the power of time to defeat the wave of mobs!

-Click to place either the Gun Tower, Missile Tower or AA Tower

-Note that the AA Tower can only attack planes, while the other 2 towers can attack everything but planes

-Clicking the rewind button costs 5 power and rewinds to the start of the game

-The game ends when 1 mob escapes or when you defeat them all

Good luck and thanks for playing :)
